chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Dark One's Touch
chapters.info: Faiselle, p. 124—Sitter in the Hall of the Tower of Salidar. She disapproved of Egwene being raised Amyrlin. She sits with Lelaine's Sitters. She is stocky, and has coppery skin and a square face. She grew up in Arad Doman. She is now involved with the negotiations with Elaida.
